channel.title: [317] ZeroScape V1.0 [Dragon Claws&Godswords&More!]
channel.description:
[size=20pt][b]ZeroScape V1.0[/b][/size]
[b][u]ZeroScape V3.0 in development![/u][/b]
[b]Version 2.0 - click [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,420115.0.html]here[/url][/b]
[b][u][size=10pt]Server features![/size][/u][/b] - Vengeance 100%! Only 1 vengeance per 30 seconds! - Nice home with shops! - Dragon Claws Special 100%! - Skill Area (not all skills in V1.0) - Skillcape seller dont sell (t) if only one 99, or not at all. - Good starter (remember, it is pk server!;P) - Donator rank, with [i]Donator crown[/i]! - Very blank in case you want as base - [i]runserver.bat[/i] and [i]build.bat[/i] is located in a folder called [i]com[/i] - Good prices (Dragon Claws: 80 mil, Partyhats: 950 mil) - Godsword stances! - Dragon Claw stances! - Genie can reset players defence level! - Father Aereck give out barrage rune and food! - Wise Old Man counts your 99 skills! - Skill masters at Skill Area! Sell Skillcapes for 99,000 gp! - EXP Lock! Can be toggled in settings tab! - Cool old (deleted all nulls) pure shop! New NPC! - Ability to mute players by IP address! - Ability to ban players by IP address! - TzTok-Jad! Based on heightlevel (cannot team him!) - Godwars! General Graador, good drops! - Normal Magic, Ancient and Lunar 98%! - Lots of fun! Download for rest of features!
[b][u][size=10pt]Client features![/size][/u][/b] - Has over 40 RS2 Animations! - Works only on Delta bases! - New path texture! - Change server IP in [i]gui.java[/i]! - When deleting [i]java[/i]-files, it is 28 mb! - Nice Dragon Claws and Godsword ints! - Realistic Grass;)! - Download for rest of features!
[b][u][size=10pt]Client Credits![/size][/u][/b] - 40%: Drachtpkz123 (Johnny) - 30%: Owner of ElitePK V1.0 - 30%: Blurr
[b][u][size=10pt]Server Credits![/size][/u][/b] - 50%: `ZeroScape - 20%: _Delta - 30%: Devolution
[b][u][size=10pt]Server Pictures![/size][/u][/b]
[img]http://img140.imageshack.us/img140/913/zshome.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/853/aereckzz.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img101.imageshack.us/img101/503/dclawzz.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img511.imageshack.us/img511/1658/defresetzz.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img339.imageshack.us/img339/2096/huezz.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img339.imageshack.us/img339/1050/vengzz.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/176/slayerzz.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img511.imageshack.us/img511/5494/womz.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img259.imageshack.us/img259/1128/skillzz.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img301.imageshack.us/img301/9677/allxgrg.jpg[/img]
___________________________________________________________________
[b][u][size=10pt]Downloads![/size][/u][/b]
[b]Click [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?of25lnfnz3w]here[/url] to download client..![/b] (Size: 23.23 MB) [b]Click [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?dinjnmnen2w]here[/url] to download source![/b] (Size: 348 kB)

[quote="`ZeroScape, post:50, topic:322849"]First - make sure you got Java JDK (and JRE?)
Then goto > Program Files > Java
Here you’ll see a folder named something like
jdk1.6.0_14 (or some other numbers) If you dont have
it. Download Java Sun JDK (Google it…)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 2010-01-02, 22:51:55[/size][hr]ZeroScape V2.0 is soon being released! It will contain a small anti-leech as I found someone using my source, and they claimed to have coded it from scrap, which were done by maany peoples, such as Devolution and Delta, including Aryan.[/quote]
I will search and rampalamla something

item.title: [317] ZeroScape V1.0 [Dragon Claws&Godswords&More!]
item.dc:creator: @_ZeroScape `ZeroScape
item.description:
@_ZeroScape wrote:

First - make sure you got Java JDK (and JRE?)
Then goto > Program Files > Java
Here you’ll see a folder named something like
jdk1.6.0_14 (or some other numbers) If you dont have
it. Download Java Sun JDK (Google it…)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 2010-01-02, 22:51:55[/size][hr]ZeroScape V2.0 is soon being released! It will contain a small anti-leech as I found someone using my source, and they claimed to have coded it from scrap, which were done by maany peoples, such as Devolution and Delta, including Aryan.

Read full topic
